Articles.Content:
Uses docking ports magnetics to straiten itself (and wheels for more constraints)

Press 2 to get solar panels out and then 1 to get the hubs detached. go to one and trim it with E for rotation and the other with Q. you can rotate them the same way but it could cause problems if they get caught (sometimes all the time... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) ) this is not even close to perfect and is just a crude PoC. [DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/jb63azs21xu6o3i/Galileo%20Station.craft?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/cdLB0)
Great looking station dude, and you have an eye for nice pics too. Have you tried walking a kerbal along the inside of the ring? Is that a thing? Either way, good job mate.
